JRuby

Java powered Ruby implementation

This is a community wiki dedicated to [http://jruby.org JRuby], an implementation of the [http://www.ruby-lang.org/en Ruby] programming language atop the Java Virtual Machine (JVM). 		[[image: jrubylogo-medium.png]]
